Movie & Dining: 15% Up to ₹500 Off at Partner Restaurants With Axis Bank Dining Delights Program
Rewards Rate: 5% Cashback on Flipkart & Cleartrip, 7.5% Cashback on Myntra, 4% Cashback on Preferred Partners (Swiggy, Uber, PVR, and cult.fit), and 1% Cashback on All Other Spends

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Annual fee waived on spends of Rs. 3.5 lakhs
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% surcharge for fuel purchases between Rs. 400 & Rs. 4,000 (max waiver capped at Rs. 400/month).

product_details: 4% cash back on preferred partners, including Swiggy, Uber, PVR, and cult.fit
1% cashback on all other retail spends (with a few exceptions).
1% fuel surcharge waiver across petrol pumps in India for purchases worth ₹400 and ₹4,000. The maximum waiver is ₹400 per statement cycle.
